summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Proclaim Open Top Mesh Wrap Review Date: 2013/12/04 Store: Proclaim Product Description: ['For those times when you need to protect the edges of your style, the Proclaim Style It Up Open Top Mesh Wrap is ideal. This wrap has an open top and a Velcro fastener and is designed to cover the edges of your hair, leaving the crown open. The breathable material lets your hair get enough air and stay controlled without being smothered.'] Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 0.1 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '019663378166', 'Manufacturer': 'Proctor & Gamble'} Review Text: Even though I have to be careful not to let my long hair get caught in the Velcro closure I really like this mesh wrap because it makes cross wrapping so much easier, I like to use this to keep my hair in place...it's better than sleeping with duck clips in your hair. Review Title: great for cross wrapping hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Russet Review Date: 2015/07/31 Store: La Femme Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette'} Review Text: I was expecting it to be matte but instead it's full of sparkles, which I hate. It's also too powdery, which makes a mess everywhere if you are not careful. this also causes you to use too much product...in the end wasting so much of it. The colours are pretty, but way lighter than what I expected. It's an okay product. Not surprised, when you look at the price it is sold for. Review Title: It's an okay product (very powdery, the colours are lighter than expected) Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Soft'n Style Large Butterfly Clamps, 12 Count Review Date: 2015/07/31 Store: Soft 'N Style Product Description: ['Large butterfly clamps which is perfect for separating long or short hair and \xa0great for hot rollers.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': "Soft 'N Style", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Unit Count': '12 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '186B', 'UPC': '524883549628 767485035766 755332353774 882341400929 748616604990 884896789726 087768000039', 'Manufacturer': "Soft'n Style"} Review Text: I have had them for the past 3 years and they are still as good as new. They hold my thick hair in place, perfectly. They are really good quality. I would recommend them. Review Title: Great product, still as good as new after 3 years Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: La Femme Blush-on Rouge-Sienna Review Date: 2015/07/31 Store: La Femme Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'La Femme', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'UPC': '796433017981'} Review Text: It's lighter than I what I expected but it's a very pretty color. I very much like it. The only problem is that it's very loose and can cause quite a mess if not careful. Review Title: Very pretty color Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: (3 Pack) NYX Butter Lipstick - Licorice Review Date: 2015/07/31 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Cream', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'UPC': '712395476239'} Review Text: This colour is very pretty, my mother and I love it so much Love NYX lipsticks. It's very soft and moisturizing, hence the name butter lipstick. Would definitely recommend. Review Title: Beautiful colour Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NYX Liq Suede LipstickVintage, 1 Count Review Date: 2015/09/01 Store: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Cream, Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 0.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0800897840327', 'Manufacturer': 'Nyx'} Review Text: This colour is so beautiful ! I was looking for something similar to Anastasia Beverly hills lipsticks (can't spend $30 on a lipstick). This was sold for cheaper. It looks a lot like Vamp from ABH. It's a gorgeous matte colour. It has become one of my favorite ! Review Title: Gorgeous colour ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Annie Soft Twist Rollers 7" 10 pcs Purple, Perfect for styling your hair, hair style, perm, rods, curls, hair curl, hair perm, long hair, curly hair, straight hair, for all hair types, flex rods, soft material Review Date: 2015/09/07 Store: Annie Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Flexi Rod', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'Annie', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 4 Ounces'} Review Text: These are the best jumbo bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! They are so easy to use and give such gorgeous waves (Just like what you would get if you had done a rollerset on your hair). You get those gorgeous, wide, spiral curls that would compliment anyone. They bend quite easily, which is a surprise since I have heard jumbo flexi rods are difficult to bend. You do have to have long hair in order to use them properly.
It will also hold better if you have thick hair with texture to it. Bone straight hair won't hold too well. I highly recomment these, there are my new faves ! Review Title: The best bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Do not repeat specific product names or details. It has become one of my favorite ! Review Title: Gorgeous colour ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Annie Soft Twist Rollers 7" 10 pcs Purple, Perfect for styling your hair, hair style, perm, rods, curls, hair curl, hair perm, long hair, curly hair, straight hair, for all hair types, flex rods, soft material Review Date: 2015/09/07 Store: Annie Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Flexi Rod', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'Annie', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 4.53 x 1.57 inches; 4 Ounces'} Review Text: These are the best jumbo bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! They are so easy to use and give such gorgeous waves (Just like what you would get if you had done a rollerset on your hair). You get those gorgeous, wide, spiral curls that would compliment anyone. They bend quite easily, which is a surprise since I have heard jumbo flexi rods are difficult to bend. You do have to have long hair in order to use them properly.
It will also hold better if you have thick hair with texture to it. Bone straight hair won't hold too well. I highly recomment these, there are my new faves ! Review Title: The best bendy rollers/Flexi rods I have ever used ! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Hair Care & Styling**: Frequently purchases items focused on hair maintenance and styling (mesh wraps, hair clamps, flexi rods). Shows a preference for products that help secure hair and create styles, valuing quality and effectiveness.

- **Makeup Products**: Engages with an array of cosmetics, notably blush and lipsticks. Has mixed feelings about quality; appreciates pleasing colors but dislikes products that are too powdery or messy. 

- **Brand Loyalty**: Exhibits preferences for specific brands (NYX, La Femme, Proclaim) indicating a tendency to trust certain manufacturers.

- **Product Attributes**: Values functionality (e.g., easy to use, long-lasting), and texture (soft, moisturizing) in makeup. Displays a strong inclination towards products that provide a beautiful finish without excessive sparkle or mess.

- **Rating Trends**: Generally gives higher ratings to products that meet expectations of quality and performance (5-star for effective tools vs. 3-star for mediocre cosmetics). 

- **User Experience**: Recurrent themes in reviews highlight user experience, with a focus on usability, efficiency, and quality satisfaction, especially in styling tools. 

Overall, the individual prioritizes practicality and aesthetics in purchases, maintaining a blend of reliability in brands and functionality in product features.

target_interaction.title: Beautiful color
target_interaction.text: It's a bit lighter than what I expected but it is such a beautiful color. It's lighter than Salem from lime crime by one shade. It looks like a beautiful nude color on women of color. It's also matte but not drying at all, very comfortable to wear. I highly recommend this shade.
target_interaction.title_meta: Jordana Modern Matte Lipstick, Matte Frappuccino [03] 0.11 oz
features: Easy to apply. Stays put all day.
Apply Matte Lipstick starting in the center of your upper lip work toward the outer edge. The same technique applies for your bottom lip.
description: Modern Matte Lipsticks are a winning combination of high payoff pigments and special ingredients that comfortably extend the wear, Expertly selected shades have an all-day wear without the typical dry lip. With the perfect blast of show stopping color and a non-drying matte finish your lips will speak for you!
